events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product sent was not what I ordered.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to keywords related to refund and return request.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for handling the refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process the refund faster.
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a picture showing the product I actually got, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method. Expect the amount back within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund confirmation. I appreciate your help resolving this issue so quickly.
The refund process has been completed successfully and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund; please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund was confirmed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
